entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Light snow beginning overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
